text: Lampides is a genus of butterflies in the family Lycaenidae. It currently consists of one species: Lampides boeticus (Linnaeus, 1767), the peablue or long-tailed blue. Lampides used to contain other species, most of which have now been moved to the genus Jamides. ==External links== * Lampides boeticus at Captain's European Butterfly Guide * Lampides boeticus Archived link Category:Lycaenidae genera
title: Lampides
